mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Citizens of Albemarle County, Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Referred to a Select Committee January 28, 1829, Washington. Pamphlet.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Jay Johns Collection of James Monroe Papers
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memorial of the Citizens of Albemarle County, in Virginia, Praying Congress to reconsider the claims of Mr. Monroe, late President of the United States, upon the Government, and to renumerate him for his losses and sacrifices incurred in the service of the country
